# fossil-api-initial-repo
This is the initial Fossil repository

```bash
curl --location --request GET 'http://localhost:3000/getStorage' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
  "accountAddress": "0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f",
  "storageKeys": "0x199c2e6b850bcc9beaea25bf1bacc5741a7aad954d28af9b23f4b53f5404937b"
}
'
```
